organizations.name: Bharat Certifications
organizations.disclaimerText: All exams are independent practice tools designed to build proficiency and are not affiliated with any official certifying body unless explicitly stated.

exams.name: CA Foundation Practice Exam
exams.description: A practice test covering the core concepts of the Chartered Accountancy Foundation course.

exams.name: CA Foundation Certification
exams.description: Certify your knowledge of the fundamentals required for the Chartered Accountancy course.

exams.name: CS Executive Practice Exam
exams.description: Test your knowledge of company law, tax laws, and securities laws for the CS Executive programme.

exams.name: CS Executive Certification
exams.description: Certify your expertise in corporate and management accounting as per the ICSI CS Executive syllabus.

exams.name: CMA Intermediate Practice Exam
exams.description: A practice exam covering financial accounting, laws, and ethics for the CMA Intermediate course.

exams.name: CMA Intermediate Certification
exams.description: Validate your skills in cost and management accountancy with this comprehensive certification exam.

examProductCategories.name: Chartered Accountancy (CA)
examProductCategories.description: Prepare for the rigorous Chartered Accountancy exams conducted by the ICAI. This program focuses on the Foundation level.

examProductCategories.name: Company Secretary (CS)
examProductCategories.description: Master corporate law, governance, and compliance for the ICSI's Company Secretary examinations (Executive Programme).

examProductCategories.name: Cost & Management Accountancy (CMA)
examProductCategories.description: Excel in cost and management accounting principles for the CMA examinations by the ICMAI (Intermediate Course).

certificateTemplates.title: Certificate of Proficiency
certificateTemplates.body: This certifies that {candidateName} has successfully demonstrated proficiency in the {examName} practice exam, achieving a score of {finalScore}%.

certificateTemplates.title: Certificate of Achievement
certificateTemplates.body: This is to certify that {candidateName} has successfully completed the rigorous requirements of the {examName} and is hereby awarded this certificate upon achieving a passing score of {finalScore}%.

suggestedBooks.title: Taxmann's CRACKER for Principles and Practice of Accounting (CA-Foundation)
suggestedBooks.description: A comprehensive book with past exam questions and detailed answers for the CA-Foundation exam.

suggestedBooks.title: Shuchita Prakashan Scanner CS Executive Programme (New Syllabus)
suggestedBooks.description: An essential exam guide with chapter-wise questions and solutions from past ICSI exams.

suggestedBooks.title: Padhuka's Students' Handbook on Cost and Management Accounting
suggestedBooks.description: A student-friendly handbook covering the entire syllabus for the CMA Intermediate course with practical problems.
